org.trianacode.gui.main.imp

Class MainTrianaLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.gui.main.imp.MainTrianaLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.LayoutManager, ZoomLayout, TaskLayoutDetails

    public class MainTrianaLayout
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.LayoutManager, TaskLayoutDetails, ZoomLayout
    The layout manager for positioning the triana tools on the workspace.

      • MainTrianaLayout

        public MainTrianaLayout(int border,
                int forshowspace,
                double zoom)
        Constructs a main triana layout with the specified border
        Parameters:
        border - the border around the components
        forshowspace - the space between the rightmost componenet and the right hand for show tools.
